table.Name: wcms_Role
table.Title: #Roles
table.SQL_SELECT_LIST:
set nocount on
declare @totalItem int, @totalPage int set @totalItem = ( select count(0) from wcms_Role where { Role_ID <o> @Search:Role_ID and } { Role_Name <o> @Search:Role_Name and } { Role_ParentID <o> @Search:Role_ParentID and } 1 = 1 ) if (@pageSize < 1) set @pageSize = 10 set @totalPage = ceiling(@totalItem * 1.0 / @pageSize) if (@pageIndex < 1) set @pageIndex = 1 if (@pageIndex > @totalPage) set @pageIndex = @totalPage
select [Role_ID] ,[Role_Name] ,[Role_IsAdmin] ,case when [Role_A] = 1 then 'checked' else '' end as [Role_A] ,0 as [locked] from ( select top (@pageIndex * @pageSize) ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY {@Sort} {@Asc}) as [num] ,[Role_ID] ,[Role_Name] ,[Role_IsAdmin] ,[Role_A] from wcms_Role where { Role_ID <o> @Search:Role_ID and } { Role_Name <o> @Search:Role_Name and } { Role_ParentID <o> @Search:Role_ParentID and } 1 = 1 ) tb where [num] between (@pageIndex - 1 ) * @pageSize + 1 AND @pageIndex * @pageSize select @totalItem, @pageSize, @pageIndex
table.SQL_LOAD_EDIT:
set nocount on
declare @GroupRole nvarchar(max) set @GroupRole = '' select @GroupRole = @GroupRole + ';' + convert(nvarchar(10), GroupRole_GroupID) from wcms_GroupRole where GroupRole_RoleID = @editID if (@GroupRole <> '') set @GroupRole = substring(@GroupRole, 2, len(@GroupRole) - 1)
select [Role_ID] ,[Role_Name] ,[Role_IsAdmin] ,@GroupRole as [Role_RoleGroup] ,[Role_ParentID] ,[Role_A] from wcms_Role where Role_ID = @editID
table.SQL_UPDATE_ACTIVE: update wcms_Role set [Role_A]= @active where Role_ID = @editID select @editID
table.SQL_DELETE: delete wcms_GroupRole where GroupRole_RoleID = @delID delete wcms_Role where Role_ID = @delID select 1
